title: Inception
desc: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal secrets and plant ideas.

title: The Dark Knight
desc: Batman faces off against the Joker in a battle for Gotham's soul.

title: Interstellar
desc: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space.

title: Parasite
desc: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household with unintended consequences.

title: The Matrix
desc: A hacker learns about the true nature of his reality.

title: Gladiator
desc: A Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
desc: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

title: Fight Club
desc: An insomniac and a soap maker form an underground club.

title: Forrest Gump
desc: A simple man lives an extraordinary life through history.

title: The Godfather
desc: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.

title: Pulp Fiction
desc: Stories of crime in Los Angeles interweave with dark humor.

title: Avengers: Endgame
desc: The Avengers unite to reverse the damage caused by Thanos.
